Now you can eat up, slim down, and control insulin--with 150 easy recipes that are scientifically designed and sinfully good.
Imagine being able to lose weight while enjoying satisfying amounts of delicious food. 

Now, thanks to Dr. Rob Thompson's revolutionary eating plan based on the breakthrough science of the glycemic load, you can prepare fabulously filling meals that actually speed up your metabolism, curb your cravings, and improve the way you look and feel.
